Created an attachment (id=64235)
out of memory error because of PE windows binary parser enabled.

Using Eclipse 3.3M6 and CDT 4.0.0.200703302000.

I enable PE windows binary parser on a large project, and then the project opens a binary folder.
When I clip the + on the binary folder to expend, I get a out of memory error as attached.  If I don't close ecslipse and then disable PE windows binary parser in works again OK!.
If I do exit eclipse, I can not restart it until I delete the complete project from the workspace.

Below is the error log for the case above when eclipse is shut down before disabling the PE windows binary parser.
